title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 25 November 2008 - XWiki
content:

http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/Problemwithdeletingattachments xwikibot - (25/11/2008 08:44): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Added the bonus links to activate/deactivate the extension) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 08:49): FAQ.Problemwithdeletingattachments was modified by XWiki.EliGeorg - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/Problemwithdeletingattachments asiri - (25/11/2008 09:38): vmassol: about paragraphs begining with a line break like


Hi

vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:39): asiri: yes? asiri - (25/11/2008 09:39): because of the
the generated (%align="center"%) params does not apply for the text "hi" (vmassol) asiri - (25/11/2008 09:39): there is a line break between them ... vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:39): ah right vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:40): err wait vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:40): one line is good vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:40): 2 lines would be a problem asyd - (25/11/2008 09:40): hello there vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:42): hi asiri vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:42): oops vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:42): hi asyd asiri - (25/11/2008 09:42): vmassol: even one line seems to cause problems : http://tinypaste.com/pre.php?id=d6817 asiri - (25/11/2008 09:42): the case 2: doesn not align the text in center .. xwikibot - (25/11/2008 09:42): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:43): asiri: the following would certainly not work



Hi

vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:43): we'll need to have (((...))) support for this to work asiri - (25/11/2008 09:44): vmassol: yes, but even with one
element it doesn't work :( vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:44): so? vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:44): what do you suggest? asiri - (25/11/2008 09:46): vmassol: well, i can search for paragraphs begining with
elements for the moment. But without (((...))) (embedded documents ?) we cannot give a perfect solution for this i think. isn't it ? vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:47): 1) this is a XHTML parser issue and not an office importer one IMO and 2) we need (((...))) support and 3) even when we have (((...))) support it's going to be difficult to know when to use it xwikibot - (25/11/2008 09:47): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:48): asiri: I don't have time to think about this vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:48): I'll let you do it and propose a good solution vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:48): I'm constantly being distracted from my code vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:48): and I can't progress vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:48): :( asiri - (25/11/2008 09:48): vmassol: ok :) asiri - (25/11/2008 09:48): i will look into it. vmassol - (25/11/2008 09:48): thanks asiri - (25/11/2008 09:48): you are welcome. xwikibot - (25/11/2008 09:52): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial asiri - (25/11/2008 10:05): vmassol: sorry to disturb, have you committed the fix for http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2871 ? i see only .test files and the .pom has changed in the commit log. asiri - (25/11/2008 10:06): ok, nevermind asiri - (25/11/2008 10:06): found it, my mistake. xwikibot - (25/11/2008 10:07): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Extended the introduction to the add sizes extension) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 10:09): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (minor) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 10:10): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (formatting) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:32): asiri: the fix was in wikimodel asiri - (25/11/2008 10:33): which fix ? asiri - (25/11/2008 10:33): oh .. asiri - (25/11/2008 10:33): yes yes, i got it :) asiri - (25/11/2008 10:39): vmasso: this might be a stupid question, but do we have our own wikimodel version ? how did you fix it ? i'm bit confused .. vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:40): asiri: no we don't vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:40): ah vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:40): we have our own dsitribution vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:40): but I commit in the main svn trunk asiri - (25/11/2008 10:41): say, if i want to fix something on wikimodel, where is the source ? asiri - (25/11/2008 10:42): i'm searching svn.xwiki.org but i guess it's not there. may be you have a local wikimodel source tree and you work on it and then upload the jar to our remote repository ? asiri - (25/11/2008 10:43): (vmassol) vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:44): wikimodel is not ours vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:44): have you tried google? asiri - (25/11/2008 10:44): yes yes, so that means you fix it there ? vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:44): sure asiri - (25/11/2008 10:44): i thought you are not allowed to do that. ok, i got it now vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:46): allowed? vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:47): I've just submitted lots of patches for a while and then I was voted a committer vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:47): this is how it works on OSS projects in general asiri - (25/11/2008 10:47): ah ... that's what i thought .. asiri - (25/11/2008 10:47): yes, i know :) vmassol - (25/11/2008 10:47): :) asiri - (25/11/2008 11:14): vmassol: sorry to disturb (again) but can you have a look at the output of the following wiki content http://tinypaste.com/pre.php?id=52f67 Because in my xwiki installation (with the latest rendering module) only the first two bullets are rendered properly. And i can't find the issue yet either. asiri - (25/11/2008 11:15): may be not now. vmassol - (25/11/2008 11:40): asiri: there's indeed a problem but not with lists. The pb seems to be with the closing \*\* which is not recognized. I'll look into it vmassol - (25/11/2008 11:42): it's caused by the ":" character somehow xwikibot - (25/11/2008 11:43): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Lazy CSS using velocity) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 11:45): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Removed media files) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 11:47): asiri: ah wait asiri - (25/11/2008 11:47): vmassol: didn't we fix this in http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2871 > vmassol - (25/11/2008 11:47): I'm using an old XE vmassol - (25/11/2008 11:47): I was using an old XE vmassol - (25/11/2008 11:47): rebuilding asiri - (25/11/2008 11:47): me too :) asiri - (25/11/2008 11:59): vmassol: it seems like updating the rendering module alone wasn't enoguh. I re-built everything from scratch and now it works fine :) vmassol - (25/11/2008 12:00): ok cool xwikibot - (25/11/2008 12:05): Blog.XWikiDevoxx2008 was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/XWikiDevoxx2008 xwikibot - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/XWikiSyntax xwikibot - (25/11/2008 13:39): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Added a note on the skinx version needed to follow this tutorial) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 13:44): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Note on CSS/JS knowledge needed) - (25/11/2008 13:45): Drafts.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Renamed links to Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial following the rename of that page) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/ xwikibot - (25/11/2008 13:45): Drafts.HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (deleted document) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/HowToWriteSkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:50): thomasmortagne and others: one question: do we honor whitespaces in tables or do we ignore them as creole does? See
col1col2
cell11cell12
cell21cell22
vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:51): oops vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:51): wrong link vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:51): http://www.wikicreole.org/wiki/Creole1.0#section-Creole1.0-Tables thomasmortagne - (25/11/2008 13:52): vmassol: I think we should honor them as we generally honor spaces in XWiki whatever the case (multiple space, etc.), I think it's more consistent... xwikibot - (25/11/2008 13:52): Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:53): thomasmortagne: This means we won't be able to get nicely aligned tables as shown in the link vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:53): (which if I remember was the main feature of using | for table syntax in the first place :) ) vmassol - (25/11/2008 13:53): s/feature/reason/ thomasmortagne - (25/11/2008 13:58): nice graphical editing is the WYSIWYG work, I doubt we need this for syntax but i'm closer to +-0 than +-1 for this so i will let other decide xwikibot - (25/11/2008 13:58): Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (Note on where to find info on the plugin internals) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 14:00): Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.JeromeVelociter (typo) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 14:04): thomasmortagne: ok email sent. I'm also not sure... maybe I shouldn't have sent that email, we might not reach a consensus... ;) we'll see thomasmortagne - (25/11/2008 14:08): vmassol: :) xwikibot - (25/11/2008 14:08): Design.NewWysiwygEditorWikiExplorer was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jvdrean - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial vmassol - (25/11/2008 15:29): sorry guys, I broke the build, just noticed that my wikimodel jar failed to be uploaded earlier on vmassol - (25/11/2008 15:30): let me know if this is causing trouble for you... I'm fixing another wikimodel issue so if possible I'd like to finish it before redeploying a new wikimodel jar xwikibot - (25/11/2008 15:52): FAQ.DoesXWikihaveanycopyrightproblem was modified by XWiki.Tony - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/DoesXWikihaveanycopyrightproblem xwikibot - (25/11/2008 16:18): FAQ.Problemwithdeletingattachments was modified by XWiki.EliGeorg (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/Problemwithdeletingattachments xwikibot - (25/11/2008 16:29): FAQ.DoesXWikihaveanycopyrightproblem was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/DoesXWikihaveanycopyrightproblem xwikibot - (25/11/2008 16:29): FAQ.DoesXWikihaveanycopyrightproblem was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/FAQ/DoesXWikihaveanycopyrightproblem vmassol - (25/11/2008 17:22): ok I've finished fixing the table issues in the rendering. Any remaining one? vmassol - (25/11/2008 17:22): I haven't touched at the whitespace handling yet since I didn't get any feedbacjk xwikibot - (25/11/2008 20:46): XWiki.RalucaMorosan was modified by XWiki.RalucaMorosan - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/RalucaMorosan xwikibot - (25/11/2008 20:47): Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.RalucaMorosan - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 21:41): Drafts.SkinExtensionsTutorial was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Moved TOC on the side) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SkinExtensionsTutorial xwikibot - (25/11/2008 22:26): XWiki.melvinrmc was modified by XWiki.melvinrmc (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/melvinrmc
